com.alexelgier.untilted.pitch

Class OrderedPitchList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexelgier.untilted.pitch.OrderedPitchList

  • public class OrderedPitchList
extends java.lang.Object
    Data object that keeps pitches in a list, with sorting methods.
    Author:
    Alex Elgier
